review: I bought this for easy access to the free prime video content that comes with being a prime member.  Well easy is not the first thing that comes to mind when trying to get to that content.  Sure the interface is easy enough to use and navigation is a breeze, what is not easy is getting to the free content.  I need to go through the website a place the shows I want to watch in my watch list not intuitive at all.  The only good thing about the whole thing is it only cost me $19.95.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Piss poor WiFi performance. Detects my WiFi strength in my room as 2/4 bars and keeps failing to connect. I moved my router(located in my basement) to a different spot and it started showing 3/4 bars and could finally connect. Amazon advertises it as having superior WiFi performance, but its a lie. All of my phones and tablets have no problem connecting to WiFi in my bedroom.
